snippet: Mr. Gazzara’s long acting career included playing Brick in the original “Cat on a Hot Tin Roof” on Broadway and roles in influential films by John Cassavetes.
abstract: Ben Gazzara, intense actor whose long career included playing Brick in the original Cat on a Hot Tin Roof on Broadway, roles in influential films by John Cassavetes and work with several generations of top Hollywood directors, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Gazzara’s long acting career included playing Brick in the original “Cat on a Hot Tin Roof” on Broadway and roles in influential films by John Cassavetes.

headline.seo: Ben Gazzara, Actor of Stage and Screen, Dies at 81
headline.main: Ben Gazzara, Risk-Taking Actor, Is Dead at 81
headline.print_headline: Ben Gazzara, Risk-Taking Actor, Is Dead at 81
